#Quickstart
-Install tesseract-ocr-w64-setup-v4.1.0.20190314 (Source: https://github.com/tesseract-ocr/tesseract) in its default location "C:\Program Files\Tesseract-OCR\tesseract.exe"
-Run InstechCodeSolver.exe
-Right click any image online with hexadecimal code and click copy image address
-Paste image address in the URL field
-Click load image
-Click crack code to process the selected image

#Troubleshooting
-Check error.log
-If program is complaining that the directory of tesseract.exe and it is installed on your computer, open config.ini and verify that the specified tesseract directory matches your install location, else change it to the correct directory and save config.ini.
-Attempt deleting config.ini
